vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to look, behold
1a) (Qal) looked at, conspicuous (participle)
§ 1) to look, behold
1a) (Qal) looked at, conspicuous (participle)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 看, 觀看
1a) (Qal) 望著, 引人注目 (分詞) (歌 5:10)
2) 扛著旗幟或軍旗, 豎立旗幟或軍旗
2a) (Qal) 豎立軍旗 (在戰場上)
2b) (Niphal) 備有旗幟, 帶著旗幟
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 看, 观看
1a) (Qal) 望着, 引人注目 (分词) (歌 5:10)
2) 扛着旗帜或军旗, 竖立旗帜或军旗
2a) (Qal) 竖立军旗 (在战场上)
2b) (Niphal) 备有旗帜, 带着旗帜

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to carry a banner or standard, set up banner or standard
1a)(Qal) to set up standard (in battle)
1b) (Niphal) supplied with banners, bannered
